item.title: New version: biology/salmon version 1.10.0
item.description: Highly-accurate & wicked fast transcript-level quantification from RNA-seq reads using lightweight alignments.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/cuda version 12.4.0
item.description: CUDA is a parallel computing platform and application programming interface (API) model created by Nvidia. It allows software developers and software engineers to use a CUDA-enabled graphics processing unit (GPU) for general purpose processing.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: viz/py-plotly version 5.19.0_py312
item.description: Plotly's Python graphing library makes interactive, publication-quality graphs online.

item.description: Plotly's Python graphing library makes interactive, publication-quality graphs online.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/dorado version 0.5.3
item.description: Dorado is a high-performance, easy-to-use, open source basecaller for Oxford Nanopore reads.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/bcl-convert version 4.2.7
item.description: The BCL Convert App generates demultiplexed FASTQ files from a run as input.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.description: Singularity Python (spython) is the Python API for working with Singularity containers.

item.title: New version: system/restic version 0.16.3
item.description: Fast, secure, efficient backup program.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/py-numpy version 1.26.3_py312
item.description: NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.

item.title: New version: math/openblas version 0.3.26
item.description: OpenBLAS is an optimized BLAS library
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/python version 3.12.1
item.description: Python is an interpreted, interactive, object-oriented programming language.

item.title: New version: system/sqlite version 3.44.2
item.description: SQLite is a self-contained, high-reliability, embedded, full-featured, public-domain, SQL database engine.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/ncurses version 6.4
item.description: The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses in System V Release 4.0 (SVr4), and more.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/mixcr version 4.6.0
item.description: MiXCR is a universal framework that processes big immunome data from raw sequences to quantitated clonotypes.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: system/readline version 8.2
item.description: The GNU Readline library provides a set of functions for use by applications that allow users to edit command lines as they are typed in.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/R version 4.3.2
item.description: R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: biology/eman2 version 2.91
item.description: EMAN2 is a broadly based greyscale scientific image processing suite with a primary focus on processing data from transmission electron microscopes.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/ftgl version 2.1.2
item.description: FTGL is a free cross-platform Open Source C++ library that uses Freetype2 to simplify rendering fonts in OpenGL applications.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-nose version 1.3.7_py39
item.description: nose is nicer testing for python.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/suitesparse version 7.4.0
item.description: SuiteSparse is a suite of sparse matrix algorithms.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/maxima version 5.47.0
item.description: Maxima is a system for the manipulation of symbolic and numerical expressions.

item.title: New version: devel/julia version 1.10.0
item.description: Julia is a high-level, high-performance dynamic programming language for numerical computing.

item.description: GCL is the official Common Lisp for the GNU project.
